Articles.Content:
![kn81KUd.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/kn81KUd.jpg)
PLEASE READ DISCLAIMER BEFOREHAND

> 
> Who are you to decide this, I hear you asking, and here's the answer: No one. I was not elected, I just decided to do it. If you're unhappy with my decision, we can work something out. This is just my opinion, since there's no subjective way to judge "Quality" of crafts.
> If anyone feels that their craft is missed because of any kind of time-zone difference, or any kind of difference in when spacecraft fridays is put up, tell me.
> 
> If your craft is really good and was made before, and someone posts in it within that week, then it will be considered. Just to clarify, I am not encouraging necros for the sake of bumping your craft.

The week's top spacecraft!

[Anagorek' SpaceShipOne](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/131075-Space-Ship-One-with-White-Knight)

![ORfTqih.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/ORfTqih.jpg)

Anagorek has created a fantastic looking replica of the SpaceShipOne and White Knight, hop on over to this thread for more details.

[BlueCanary's Ford Kraptor](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/131253-Ford-Kraptor-Pickup-Truck-Low-part-airdrop-capable-ejection-seats)

![njRAVDL.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/njRAVDL.jpg)

A mostly reliable pickup truck that can be rocketed, warp drive powered and has ejection seats, what's not to like?

[Jon144's Relentless E.3 Tank](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/130992-Relentless-E-3-Heavy-Tank)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/AIGLQdjs8BE?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

A stock tank with working armour and weapons AND revolving turret!

[Feny'a Dump of Stuff](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114390-Fenya-s-dump-of-stuff)

![gdMh63c.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/gdMh63c.jpg)

Fenya's dump of stuff has some very interesting designs and spaceplanes, check them out!

[cb\_co Combat Aircraft](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/83118-cb_co-Replica-Combat-Aircraft-%28New-Video-Challenge-Request%29)

![Wv8DrLR.png](http://i.imgur.com/Wv8DrLR.png)

Clown\_baby has made some sweet looking combat craft that can dogfight and do stunts, check them out!

[Jolly\_Roger's Millenium Falcon](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/129682-Millennium-Falcon-this-one-actually-flies)

![e0C1m8H.png](http://i.imgur.com/e0C1m8H.png)\

Jolly\_Roger has created an impressive replica of the Millenium Falcon that actually flies and shoots!

Crafts that were considered and nearly made the cut

[Columbia's Jetliners](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/130976-Boeing-757-200-Boeing-767-300-Boeing-777-300ER-Passenger-Jetliner-replicas)

[Yaeh's Su-27](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/131035-Sukhoi-Su-27-Flanker)

[Logan.Darklighter's Battlestar](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/130890-Battlestar)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-14T15:06:50Z" title="08/14/2015 03:06  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 14, 2015</time> by Yukon0009**
No one?
Wow, I never expected to get an honorable mention, honestly ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) Thanks for doing this, Yukon!

Woo! I got featured!

I hope Spacecraft Fridays continues, it's a really great concept.
Another announcment, I am leaving for two weeks shortly, would anyone step up to the job of maintaining Spacecraft Fridays for the next two weeks or so?

Nicely done! Now I can put something out for consideration next week. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Rune. Congrats to the featured!

From the Hypersonic Division of Sector 7 Space Laboratories The [S7-X3B](https://files.secureserver.net/0sfRDaZrQMcqoG) ![p>

August 14, 2015 by castille7**

If you're trying to get it featured, it has to compete with all the other designs. And plus I'm not doing it next 2 weeks.

It does look super cool btw.

> 
> If you're trying to get it featured, it has to compete with all the other designs. And plus I'm not doing it next 2 weeks.
> It does look super cool btw.

Were you speaking to me Yukon0009? If so thank you for the compliment, also where can we find the qualifications for Spacecraft Friday's?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-14T14:36:20Z" title="08/14/2015 02:36  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 14, 2015</time> by castille7**

Man, I wish I could do this for the the next two Fridays. I'm pretty skilled at BBcode and I've got nothing to do here. Sadly, I am going on a vacation with no Wi-Fi, and I will not be back until the 30th. Wait, I ***might*** be able to do it on the 4th of next month... 

Also, good work Yukon009.

> 
> Where you speaking to me Yukon0009? If so thank you for the compliment, also where can we find the qualifications for Spacecraft Friday's?

Yup. There's no specific criteria though, that's the reason there's a disclaimer.

@Raincrafter Thanks.

So what happened to MRS's thread of the exact name? Isn't this his baby?

Also, this concept has been tried at least three or four times on this forum and the result is the same each time. People get grumpy and pissed off at the choices and then people get turned off by it.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-14T14:31:50Z" title="08/14/2015 02:31  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 14, 2015</time> by Majorjim**

> 
> So what happened to MRS's thread of the exact name? Isn't this his baby?

Maybe a new one each week? Makes more sense to keep one thread though.

Anyway I appreciate the mention, if this inspires anyone to download my craft just know I'm working on upgrades for the BDArmory update. I'm working on outfitting all the craft with radar and radar guided weapons. 

Also my new Stealth Raptor will be my flagship, and hopefully truly stealth.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/bB_lBkL2jXo?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-14T14:31:36Z" title="08/14/2015 02:31  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 14, 2015</time> by clown\_baby**
Yeah the general idea is to be something like the Daily Kerbal.

> 
> Also, this concept has been tried at least three or four times on this forum and the result is the same each time. People get grumpy and pissed off at the choices and then people get turned off by it.

There's a disclaimer, and it's based on opinion. If they get annoyed at someone for having a preference.. then that's just pretty grumpy of them. And honestly, it's a good way of making the new builders shine. I've seen so many well-made crafts that didn't get a single reply/rep, becauee they were a new builder. Ah well, it's just what I think. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

IMHO, I appreciate their work, but yes, I think it would be better to merge these two threads.

> 
> There's a disclaimer, and it's based on opinion. If they get annoyed at someone for having a preference.. then that's just pretty grumpy of them. And honestly, it's a good way of making the new builders shine. I've seen so many well-made crafts that didn't get a single reply/rep, becauee they were a new builder. Ah well, it's just what I think. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
> IMHO, I appreciate their work, but yes, I think it would be better to merge these two threads.

To be fair each time this kind of thread is started there are always disclaimers and what-not. The outcome is always the same. I don't care either way I am just surprised people don't see the signs..

> 
> There's a disclaimer, and it's based on opinion. If they get annoyed at someone for having a preference.. then that's just pretty grumpy of them. And honestly, it's a good way of making the new builders shine. I've seen so many well-made crafts that didn't get a single reply/rep, becauee they were a new builder. Ah well, it's just what I think. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
> IMHO, I appreciate their work, but yes, I think it would be better to merge these two threads.

Nah, add a date tag to them, and we can even keep changing the guy that does it as people go on vacation/life gets in the way. The more informal the better! I really like this about this thing, it's just a fun little "hey, look at what you might have missed this week on the forums". If more than one people are doing it, the criticisms for favoritism and such (and the variety of crafts) gets short of addressed. And since it's informal as hell, you shouldn't feel left out if you don't make it. The only "rule" would be to let the last guy that did it select the judge for the next week from the volunteers. And if the custom dies, it dies, probably because it's not doing its job.

Rune. I volunteer to hold the torch next week, for one week, if that helps.

Adding something that helps.

Does big red text help even a tiny bit?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-14T15:06:19Z" title="08/14/2015 03:06  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 14, 2015</time> by Yukon0009**

> 
> you shouldn't feel left out if you don't make it.

That's the issue, people do, have done and will do. Do you guys seriously not remember the last four times this was tried? There is a reason the threads dies after a week or two. Just my two cents.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-14T15:12:11Z" title="08/14/2015 03:12  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 14, 2015</time> by Majorjim**
Well, then let's push it and see how many Spacecraft Fridays we make through it before it falls apart.
..I think we need to make a discussion thread. But then again, there are already two whole threads.

Maybe a separate thread for discussing Spacecraft Friday, and the weekly threads for discussing the spacecraft I assume you mean?

- - - Updated - - -

We also need this tag.

[![plaque_zpsklxsxrib.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/plaque_zpsklxsxrib.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/plaque_zpsklxsxrib.png.html)

You can use this as the picture for my tank if you would rather have that than a video.

![JDlcdzc.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/JDlcdzc.jpg)

> 
> That's the issue, people do, have done and will do. Do you guys seriously not remember the last four times this was tried? There is a reason the threads dies after a week or two. Just my two cents.

Also, can I have a link to the old ones if you can find it?

> 
> Also, can I have a link to the old ones if you can find it?

No dude, I'm not going to link those old threads that died a deserved death here. If you want to search for them yourself go ahead. I will also have a look and PM the links if I have time tomorrow.
